EntitySets.Name: CatalogItems
EntitySets.Description: Collection of catalog items for user search operations

Properties.Name: itemID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the catalog item

Properties.Name: type
Properties.Description: Type of the catalog item (Course, Curriculum, Program)

Properties.Name: duration
Properties.Description: Duration of the catalog item in hours

Properties.Name: enrollmentStatus
Properties.Description: User's enrollment status for this item

Properties.Name: completionStatus
Properties.Description: User's completion status for this item

Properties.Name: available
Properties.Description: Whether the item is available for enrollment
